original_text:
In his humiliation he was deprived of justice.
    Who can speak of his descendants?
    For his life was taken from the earth.”
korean_text: 그가 굴욕을 당했을 때 공정한 재판도 받지 못하였으니 누가 그의 세대를 말하리요 그의 생명이 땅에서 빼앗김이로다 하였거늘

sentences.original_text: Who can speak of his descendants?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그의 자손에 대해 말할 수 있겠습니까?

sentences.original_text: For his life was taken from the earth
